entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 12:13 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
